name: Sunrise (itch) (vipnet)
description:
Sunrise - There it's all about timing, reaction speed, and the ability to play fast 

and of course hitting the shots. The game is starting with full darkness where

you have got only some point lights, and enemies keep spawn and spawn.

What you have to do to win?  to kill the enemies that spawn infinitly.

But to do that you have to remove the darkness and get to the Sunrise, where

everything is seen, you have infinity ammo and enemies does'nt spawn during 

this time. But during Sunrise the darkness is coming on.

If you killed all the enemies - Congratulations.  If not, you have to get the Sunrise

again...

Collect ammo and light fragments, shoot at the enemies, use the privilegies of 

the Sunrise and destroy the darkness.

Sunrise Version 1.1 - Sound added, use F to enable/disable it.

Attention: the game is working only on computers that have OpenGL version 3.3 or more!
